definition[0]: a group of the same kind of people
example[0]: I was surrounded by a posse of photographers.
definition[1]: a group of men gathered together by a sheriff (=local law officer) in the US in past times to help catch a criminal
definition[2]: someone’s group of friends – used especially by young people
definition[3]: a group of friends from a particular place who share an interest in rap, hip-hop, or house music
